definition: perihelion, the nearest point of a planet in elliptic orbit to the sun/lower apsis
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: The anomalistic year is the time between successive transits of the Earth through the perihelion.
sentences.chinese: 近点年是地球连续两次通过近日点之间的时间。

sentences.english: How much does the direction of perihelion change each orbit?
sentences.chinese: 近日点方向使每个轨道改变了多少？

sentences.english: A comet is at perihelion when it is closest (=very close) to the sun.
sentences.chinese: 彗星最接近太阳时，它就是在近日点。

definition: aphelion, the furthest point of a planet in elliptic orbit to the sun/opposite: perihelion 近日點|近日点[jin4 ri4 dian3]/higher apsis
Virgo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
